channel.title: ribosome on ZHONG
channel.description: Recent content in ribosome on ZHONG

item.title: Ribosomes in the sea
item.description: This project, funded by Tula fundation, is a new method development that employ extracellular free ribosomes to esimate taxon-specific microbial mortality. Estimate the cell lysis of microbes based on standing-stock seawater Estimate the cell mortatlity rate of microbes based on standing-stock seawater if we know the ribosome turnover rate Measure the “instant” cell mortatlity rate of microbes using ribosomes production and decay assay This project produce xxxx research articles and a R package.
